description:
1 + 1

Why won't she look at you anymore?
What happens at the lake of fyre?
Why won't the dog stop barking?
How come she doesn't love you?
How come she always does this?
What's wrong with your face?
Who is that man by her side?

~

3 possible endings
original music by mike kleine
a handful of unique cave locations to explore
...and more!!!

~

A Bitsy game made for HAXX!
corrupt.js by Sean S. LeBlanc
